👋 *{{chatTitle}}*!
I'm a bot 🤖 that helps you keep track of all the birthdays of the members of this group. To learn more about the available commands, type /help.
helpMessage:
These are the commands you can use:
 - /add - To add a birthday person, with name and date separated by commas (for example, `/add Samuel, 1994-03-21`)
 - /remove - To remove a birthday person (`/remove Pedro`)
 - /birthdays - List of birthdays, sorted by the next one coming up.
 - /list - List by ages.
 - /next - Shows more information about the next birthday.
